context: Major aerospace manufacturer facing new EU aviation safety regulations requiring comprehensive digital compliance systems across design, production, and maintenance operations

request.purpose: Implement integrated digital compliance platform for EU regulatory requirements
request.justification: Mandatory compliance with new EU Digital Aviation Safety Regulation effective 2026, avoid $50M+ fines and market access restrictions

decision_process.outcome: Identified 247 compliance gaps requiring digital transformation
Selected cloud-based compliance platform with AI capabilities
Positive ROI of 280% over 5 years, critical for EU market access
Full leadership alignment and department buy-in secured

business_impact.expected_outcome: 100% EU regulatory compliance, 40% reduction in compliance costs, enhanced market access
business_impact.projected_value: $85M in avoided fines and new revenue opportunities
business_impact.roi_timeline: Payback in 16 months, 280% ROI over 5 years

outcome_tracking.3_month_review: Platform selected and initial setup complete, 45% data migrated, compliance gap reduced by 20%
outcome_tracking.6_month_review: Platform implemented, 80% data migrated, initial compliance score improved 35%, training completed for 60% of users
outcome_tracking.9_month_review: Full data migration complete, 95% compliance achieved, cost savings of $2.1M realized
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: Full EU compliance achieved, 25% cost reduction realized, positive user feedback, system handling 100% regulatory reporting automatically
outcome_tracking.18_month_review: Sustained compliance at 98%, additional features implemented, ROI at 250%
outcome_tracking.actual_roi: 320% (vs projected 280%), exceeding targets due to additional efficiency gains and avoided fines

lessons_learned: Early stakeholder engagement critical for complex digital transformations, phased implementation reduced business disruption, AI features provided unexpected compliance automation benefits
